intro: Five mischievous kittens find a magic map in a tin of cookies and experience the most fun and brilliant adventure of their lives. Where will the map lead these adorable kittens?
description:
Get ready for a journey full of magic, laughter, and surprises with five adventurous kittens who will discover that even the most ordinary tin of cookies can hide an incredible secret.

It all begins when the Whiskers Gang finds a magical map hidden among the cookies.

Its sparkling symbols will guide them through enchanted forests, where each step brings fun new challenges, surprising puzzles, and curious creatures that will want to join in the fun.

Game Features:

·Enjoy magical and colorful forests full of color and magic.

·Meet curious and adorable creatures.

·Discover the island of the luminous insects and participate in their magical celebration.

·A visual novel designed for children and families: fun, safe, and full of tenderness.
